text: Judit Forgács (born 25 May 1959 in Budapest) is a Hungarian former sprinter who specialised in the 400 metres. She won bronze medals at the 1987 World Indoor Championships and 1990 European Indoor Championships. In addition she competed at the 1980 and 1992 Summer Olympics. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |rowspan=2|1977 |rowspan=2|European Junior Championships
